title: 0.13 Unable to bind "Alt|Super"
body:
Previously I used these bindings:

```
key_bindings:
  - { key: H, mods: Alt|Command, chars: "\x06\x70" }
  - { key: L, mods: Alt|Command, chars: "\x06\x6e" }
```

Which I'm now trying to use as:

```
[keyboard]
bindings = [
  { key = "H", mods = "Alt|Command", chars = "\u0006\u0070" },
  { key = "L", mods = "Alt|Command", chars = "\u0006\u006e" },
```

But these binding don't work as before and do not produce the same chars send to the terminal. I do use other mod combinations as well, like "Shift|Command" and those still work as expected. But all the ones that are using a mod that includes `Alt` seems affected.

I did try setting `option_as_alt` but that didn't make a difference. Any suggestions how to get it working in 0.13?

### System

OS: macOS
Version: alacritty 0.13.0 (78fa4d6)

### Logs

Relevant logs are below, there are no errors reported in the logs and no indications of ignored bindings.

```
[4.191950541s] [INFO ] [alacritty] winit event: AboutToWait
```
